jd_information.description: Good Communication and Comprehension skills both written and verbal.Email process.Candidates with experience of Reservations and ticketing.Should have GDS knowledge.IATA or Diploma in Tour & Travel course mandatory.Ability to multi task.Shifts timings: 7am to 4pm and 4pm to 1am (Home drop available)Typing speed should be more than 25 words per minute.
